
{{alias}}( file[, options] )
    Synchronously reads a file as JSON.

    Parameters
    ----------
    file: string|Buffer|integer
        Filename or file descriptor.
    options: Object
        Options.
    options.encoding: string|null
        Encoding. Default: null.
    options.flag: string
        Flag. Default: 'r'.
    options.reviver: Function
        JSON transformation function.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Error|JSON
        File contents.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( './beep/boop.json' );

    See Also
    --------
